name: Life & death (itch) (Emiel131517)
description:
This is our Global Game Jam game for the GGJ 2022!

Our game is based around the theme: Duality. this is done by creating a simple platformer game that has two worlds in one!

Our team (Barbabaddies) existed out of 5 people: Chantal, Kije, Gerdien, Andreas and Emiel.
